title: Student Council President Election
description: Annual election for the position of Student Council President for the 2023-2026 academic years.

candidates.applicationDescription: I promise to improve campus facilities and organize more student events.
My focus will be on academic excellence and student welfare programs.

title: Department Representative Election
description: Election for Computer Science Department Student Representative.

candidates.applicationDescription: I want to bridge the gap between students and faculty in our department.
I plan to organize more technical workshops and industry connections.

title: Student Union Treasurer
description: Election for the position of Treasurer in the Student Union.

candidates.applicationDescription: I have experience in finance and budgeting for student organizations.
